<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2631</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Dynanometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Dynanometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Dynanometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Dynanometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Dynanometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Dynanometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Dynanometer</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates how a Dynanometer works to measure the intensity of a force acting on a spring.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die zeigt, wie ein Dynanometer 
arbeitet, um die Intensität einer Kraft zu messen, die auf einem 
Frühling fungiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre comment un 
Dynanometer travaille pour mesurer l'intensité d'une force agissant 
un ressort.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre como um Dynanometer 
trabalha para medir a intensidade de uma força que age em uma mola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra come un Dynanometer 
funziona per misurare l'intensità di una forza che si comporta su una
molla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει πώς ένα Dynanometer
λειτουργεί για να μετρήσει την ένταση μιας δύναμης ενεργώντας σε 
ένα ελατήριο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra cómo un Dynanometer
trabaja para medir la intensidad de una fuerza que actúa en un 
resorte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
